name: Playful Memory
description:
In Playful Memory, you must remember the location of as many pairs of cards as possible and turn them over in the shortest amount of time to get the highest score!

• Discover a variation of the classic pair game by matching a picture with a word, in the language of your choice among those offered (English, Español and Français).

• Customize your experience by choosing from several game modes and card collections.

• Play alone or duel with a second player on the same device (or against a bot) .

Train your memory and reflexes to improve and become the champion of your family or friends. 

Share your prowess with each other and try to always do better!
